user.title: Meme Stock Insight Setup
user.description: Configure your Reddit API credentials and monitoring preferences.

data_description.reddit_client_id: The 14-character Client ID from your Reddit script app
data_description.reddit_client_secret: The Client Secret from your Reddit script app
data_description.reddit_username: Your Reddit username (must own the app)
data_description.subreddits: List of subreddits to monitor (e.g., wallstreetbets,stocks,investing)
data_description.stock_symbols: Stock symbols to specifically track (e.g., GME,AMC,TSLA)
data_description.scan_limit: Maximum number of posts to analyze per scan (10-1000)

error.reddit_auth_failed: Failed to authenticate with Reddit. Ensure your app is created as 'script' type, credentials are correct, and the username owns the Reddit app.
error.reddit_wrong_app: Reddit app must be created as a 'script' application. Please check your app settings at https://www.reddit.com/prefs/apps
error.api_error: Error connecting to external APIs. Please check your internet connection and try again.
error.unknown: An unknown error occurred. Please check the logs for more details.

abort.already_configured: This Reddit account is already configured.
